issue.title: [Python] Add custom pickle reducers for UnionScalar
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10072](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10072). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Since there is no sequence converter available for Dictionary type we cannot construct it directly so pa.scalar fail as the reducer function to reconstruct them.
